TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UriTemplateMatch extends System.Object

Docs.summary: A class that represents the results of a match operation on a instance.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.UriTemplateMatch> class represents the results of calling the <xref:System.UriTemplate.Match%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Uri%29> method. This class is not thread safe.
## Examples The following code shows how to use the <xref:System.UriTemplateMatch> class.
[!code-csharp[UriTemplateMatch#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/uritemplatematch/cs/program.cs#0)] [!code-vb[UriTemplateMatch#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/uritemplatematch/vb/program.vb#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Usually you do not directly instantiate this class, a <xref:System.UriTemplateMatch> instance is returned from the <xref:System.UriTemplate.Match%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Uri%29> or <xref:System.UriTemplateTable.MatchSingle%28System.Uri%29> method. The <xref:System.UriTemplateTable.Match%2A> method returns a collection of <xref:System.UriTemplateMatch> as well.

Docs.summary: Gets and sets the base URI for the template match.
Docs.value: A instance that represents the base URI for the template match.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code shows how to access the <xref:System.UriTemplateMatch.BaseUri%2A> property.
[!code-csharp[UriTemplateMatch#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/uritemplatematch/cs/snippets.cs#1)] [!code-vb[UriTemplateMatch#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/uritemplatematch/vb/snippets.vb#1)]

Docs.summary: Gets the collection for the template match.
Docs.value: A instance that contains template variable values extracted from the URI during the match.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Each template variable name appears as a name in this collection, and the value bound to that variable is stored under the corresponding name. The values in this collection have had all escape sequences translated into actual characters. This name value collection uses a case insensitive search when matching variable names.
## Examples The following code shows how to access the <xref:System.UriTemplateMatch.BoundVariables%2A> property.
[!code-csharp[UriTemplateMatch#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/uritemplatematch/cs/snippets.cs#2)] [!code-vb[UriTemplateMatch#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/uritemplatematch/vb/snippets.vb#2)]

Docs.summary: Gets and sets the object associated with the instance.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When you add a <xref:System.UriTemplate> to a <xref:System.UriTemplateTable> you associate data with the template. This value is application specific; no particular semantics are associated with this value. When <xref:System.UriTemplateTable.Match%28System.Uri%29> is called and a match is found the data associated with the matching template is returned in the <xref:System.UriTemplateMatch.Data%2A> property.
## Examples The following code shows how to access the <xref:System.UriTemplateMatch.Data%2A> property.
[!code-csharp[UriTemplateMatch#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/uritemplatematch/cs/snippets.cs#3)] [!code-vb[UriTemplateMatch#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/uritemplatematch/vb/snippets.vb#3)]

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of query string parameters and their values.
Docs.value: A instance that contains the query string parameters and their values.

remarks.format:
## Remarks All query string name/value pairs from the original URI appear in this collection, even if they are not explicitly specified in the template string that was matched. The values in this collection have been had all escape sequences translated into actual characters.
## Examples The following code shows how to access the <xref:System.UriTemplateMatch.QueryParameters%2A> property.
[!code-csharp[UriTemplateMatch#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/uritemplatematch/cs/snippets.cs#4)] [!code-vb[UriTemplateMatch#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/uritemplatematch/vb/snippets.vb#4)]

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of relative path segments.
Docs.value: A collection of relative path segments.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This property contains a collection of the path segments from the candidate URI that matched the template along with path segments that matched a template wildcard. Path segments that matched a template wildcard are also contained in the <xref:System.UriTemplateMatch.WildcardPathSegments%2A> property.
## Examples The following code shows how to access the <xref:System.UriTemplateMatch.RelativePathSegments%2A> property.
[!code-csharp[UriTemplateMatch#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/uritemplatematch/cs/snippets.cs#5)] [!code-vb[UriTemplateMatch#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/uritemplatematch/vb/snippets.vb#5)]

Docs.summary: Gets and sets the matched URI.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code shows how to access the <xref:System.UriTemplateMatch.RequestUri%2A> property.
[!code-csharp[UriTemplateMatch#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/uritemplatematch/cs/snippets.cs#6)] [!code-vb[UriTemplateMatch#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/uritemplatematch/vb/snippets.vb#6)]

Docs.summary: Gets and sets the instance associated with this instance.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This property contains the <xref:System.UriTemplate> that the candidate URI matched.
## Examples The following code shows how to access the <xref:System.UriTemplateMatch.Template%2A> property.
[!code-csharp[UriTemplateMatch#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/uritemplatematch/cs/snippets.cs#7)] [!code-vb[UriTemplateMatch#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/uritemplatematch/vb/snippets.vb#7)]

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of path segments that are matched by a wildcard in the URI template.
Docs.value: A collection of path segments that are matched by a wildcard in the URI template.

remarks.format:
